App Name: Chat Styles

Brief: Transform your standard text into a canvas of creativity with Chat Styles. Boasting a diverse range of stylish fonts, this app breathes life into your messages, statuses, and social media interactions. Whether you're crafting an engaging bio or jazzing up your everyday conversations, Chat Styles offers an instant font preview, ensuring that your message hits the mark every time.
